title: Netflix Kicks Off 2024 With Highly-Rated Survival Biopic Movie On Rotten Tomatoes
summary: Netflix starts 2024 strong with its first hit of the year with the biopic survival movie Society of the Snow, earning a high score on Rotten Tomatoes.

title: Scarlet Witch Returns As The MCU's New Sorcerer Supreme In Marvel Multiverse Fan Art
summary: The Scarlet Witch has been imagined as the MCU's new Sorcerer Supreme in brilliant fan art that explores Marvel Studios' vast multiverse.

title: New Animated Movie From Minions Studio Passes Huge Box Office Milestone Despite Slow Start
summary: Illumination Entertainment, the studio behind the Minions franchise, sees their slow-starting new release pass a huge box office milestone worldwide.

title: Steven Spielberg Returning To Thriller Genre For First Time In Over 30 Years (With A Twist)
summary: Acclaimed director Steven Spielberg will be returning to the thriller genre for the first time in over 30 years, but there is a major twist.

title: The Spider-Verse's Spider-Man Actor Reveals His One Condition For Returning In A Live-Action Movie
summary: One of the main actors for Sony's Spider-Verse franchise has spoken about whether he would reprise his role as Spider-Man in live-action.
